name: Judgement of the Dead (Dbgamerstarz)
description:
Welcome to the agency

You have been selected to join The Agency, a collection of people hand-chosen by Anubis to do his work - there are simply too many people and too little time.

Weigh the good and the bad of each person, and make a choice - are they good, or evil?

Features
  • Judge each soul:
    • Each soul has a history. Judge accordingly
  • Choose their fate:
    • Choose whether you want to condemn them to die again, or to spend eternity in paradise
  • Do not fail
    • You have 3 strikes - fail, and you will be destroyed alongside the other souls.

This game does not require many controls - all you need is a mouse and some headphones.

You can play in browser, macos, linux and windows!

Please be sure to rate and comment to let us know what you thought!
